basic.name: Meteor Kata
basic.description:
5-sequence Gun Kata.

1st Sequence: 100% ATK of Physical DMG.
2nd Sequence: 100% ATK of Physical DMG.
3rd Sequence: 100% ATK of Physical DMG.
4th Sequence: 150% x 2 ATK of Physical DMG.
5th Sequence: 250% ATK of Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Comet Kata
subskills.description: Physical DMG dealt by each sequence of the 4-sequence Basic ATK increases by 143.0.

subskills.name: Comet Break
subskills.description: When Basic/Combo ATK breaks an enemy shield, additionally deals 220.0% ATK of Physical DMG against the target.

subskills.name: Comet Impact
subskills.description: When Basic ATK interrupts an enemy, it has a 40.0% chance to inflict 3 Stun Trauma (CD: 7s).

special.name: Combo: Comet Fall
special.description:
Attacks enemy with a double-kick, punting it into the air and then bringing it down.

Punt: 50% ATK of Physical DMG.
Bring Down: 275% ATK of AOE Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Switch: Neko Stomp
subskills.description: Slams down on entry, dealing 600.0% ATK of Physical DMG. Enemies interrupted receive 6 Stun Trauma.

subskills.name: QTE: Aerial Helix
subskills.description: QTE: Triggered when an enemy is knocked airborne. Deals 375% ATK + 2250.0 of Physical DMG. The last hit inflicts 3 Stun Trauma.

subskills.name: Gravity Freak
subskills.description: The 2nd sequence of Combo ATK and Neko Stomp additionally deal 1125 Fire DMG against enemies with an unbroken Elite Shield.

ultimate.name: Neko-Charm!
ultimate.description:
Activates Valkyrie's burst mode and consumes SP.

Burst: Consumes SP continuously to gain Attack Speed and Ignore Interrupt.
Consumes 20 SP (at over 100 SP) to activate and 10 SP/s afterwards until SP is depleted; max duration: 60s.

subskills.name: Valkyrie Impact
subskills.description: Burst activation deals 2610.0 Physical DMG to enemies nearby and inflicts 6 Stun Trauma on them.

subskills.name: Valkyrie Barrier
subskills.description: The team gains Ignore Interrupt and 100% DEF during Burst.

subskills.name: Valkyrie Charge
subskills.description: Charges up once every 12.0s. The next attack consumes the charge to inflict 6 Stun Trauma.

evasion.name: Neko Cartwheel
evasion.description:
Quickly cartwheel to evade enemy attacks. Can be performed twice in a row.

Ultimate Evasion triggers 3s of Global Time Fracture. CD: 15s.
Tap [ATK] after Ultimate Evasion to connect into Comet Fall.

subskills.name: Time Bender
subskills.description: Shortens CD of Time Fracture by 4.0s.

subskills.name: Temporal Flow
subskills.description: Additionally restores 5.0 SP for the team when Ultimate Evasion triggers Time Fracture.

subskills.name: Antimatter Rounds
subskills.description: Deal 50.0% more DMG against shields.

subskills.name: Critical Mastery
subskills.description: Gains 40.0% Crit DMG at above 80% HP.

leader.name: Comet Bless
leader.description: Leader Bonus: Team gains 10% Max HP in battle.

subskills.name: Guider
subskills.description: Team gains 18% Max HP in battle.

basic.name: Gyrodrive Kata
basic.description:
Fire 4 shots in rapid succession.

1st Shot: 100% ATK of Physical DMG.
2nd Shot: 100% ATK of Physical DMG.
3rd Shot: 150% ATK of Physical DMG.
4th Shot: 250% ATK of Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Concentrate Fire
subskills.description: Each repeated attack against the same target gains 2% ATK Speed (max: 35%). Effect resets if not attacking for 2s or switching targets.

subskills.name: Bleeding Shot
subskills.description: When Basic ATK scores a Crit, it has a 80% chance to inflict 2 Bleed Trauma (CD: 1s).

subskills.name: QTE: Meteor Shower
subskills.description: Triggers when an enemy is frozen, dealing 600% ATK of Physical DMG against a single target. Last hit of the QTE deals 400.1% ATK of AOE Physical DMG and impairs the target, reducing their DEF by 60% for 6s.

special.name: Combo: Aerolite Impact
special.description:
Fires a Power Shot after 3 consecutive shots.

Power Shot: 350% ATK of Physical DMG to all targets in a straight line.

subskills.name: Comet Blast
subskills.description: When Combo ATK scores a Crit, it has a 50.0% chance to inflict 3 Stun Trauma.

subskills.name: Nova Barrage
subskills.description: Combo ATK additionally deals 296 Physical DMG against the target.

subskills.name: Falling Comet
subskills.description: When performing Combo ATKs, gains Ignore Interrupt and 60.0% DEF.

ultimate.name: Gungnir Fire
ultimate.description:
Summons a Valkyrie heavy cannon to blast away at enemies before her.

Uncanny Cannon: Up to 1200% ATK of Physical DMG.
SP Cost: 50.

subskills.name: Valkyrie Impact
subskills.description: The last hit of the Ultimate inflicts 6 Stun Trauma.

subskills.name: Valkyrie Impulse
subskills.description: During Ultimate, tap [ATK] repeatedly to additionally deal 371 Fire DMG for each tap (max: 15 times).

subskills.name: Valkyrie Frenzy
subskills.description: Ultimate gains 20.0% Crit DMG.

evasion.name: Singularity
evasion.description:
Quickly cartwheels away to evade enemy attacks. Can be performed twice in a row.

Energy Black Hole: Triggers upon an Ultimate Evasion. Lasts for 2s, during which it pulls in enemies nearby. CD: 10s.

subskills.name: Star Sprint
subskills.description: After evasion or battle entry, gain 70.0% Move Speed for 4.0s. CD: 6s.

subskills.name: Time Bender
subskills.description: Shortens CD of Ultimate Evasion by 3.0s.

subskills.name: Nova Collapse
subskills.description: Extends the duration of Energy Black Hole to 5.0s and expands the pull-in range by 6.0 meters.

subskills.name: Antimatter Rounds
subskills.description: Deal 60.0% more DMG against shields.

subskills.name: Shattering Blow
subskills.description: Breaking an enemy shield deals 100% ATK of Physical DMG and inflicts 3 Stun Trauma.

subskills.name: Critical Mastery
subskills.description: Gain 10.0% Crit DMG. Deal 50.0% more Crit DMG against Frozen enemies.

leader.name: Flying Comet
leader.description: Leader Bonus: Team gains 10% Move Speed. MECH-type characters gain 5% Attack Speed.

subskills.name: Speed Boost
subskills.description: Team gains 25% Move Speed. MECH-type characters gain 14% Attack Speed.

basic.name: Gotamashiki
basic.description:
Swift penta-slash.

1st Sequence: 100% ATK of Physical DMG.
2nd Sequence: 120% ATK of Physical DMG.
3rd Sequence: 75% ATK of Physical DMG.
4th Sequence: 80% ATK of Physical DMG.
5th Sequence: 250% ATK of AOE Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Relentless Slash
subskills.description: Increases Attack Speed by 15.0% when Combo Hit Count exceeds 20.

subskills.name: Blood Sakura
subskills.description: Basic attacks have a 20.0% chance to inflict 2 Bleed Trauma.

subskills.name: Night Sakura
subskills.description: Final hit of Basic ATK increases Combo ATK DMG by 20% for 6.0s.

special.name: Combo: Whirling Petals
special.description:
Soaring whirlwind slash that knocks surrounding enemies airborne.

Whirling Slash: 7 × 60% ATK of Physical DMG.

subskills.name: QTE: Iaido Whirlwind
subskills.description:
Switch entry unleashes an Insta-Slash.
QTE: Triggered upon shieldbreak or when an enemy is knocked airborne to launch Storm Slasher and deal 225% + 400% ATK of Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Airborne Whirlwind
subskills.description: Triggers a Combo ATK by tap-and-holding the [ATK] button during any Basic ATK.

subskills.name: Double Whirlwind
subskills.description: Tap the [ATK] button during Combo ATK to unleash 1 more Combo ATK. DMG dealt equals 100.0% of the 1st hit of the 1st Combo ATK.

ultimate.name: Amaterasu
ultimate.description:
Activates Valkyrie SP burst to unleash a forward slash.

Amaterasu: Deals up to 1150% ATK of Physical DMG.
SP Cost: 50

subskills.name: Soul Power
subskills.description: Each strike of Amaterasu additionally deals 18.0% ATK of Fire DMG. Can be triggered up to 17 times.

subskills.name: Spirit Blade
subskills.description: Gain 15 Max SP in battle. Amaterasu costs 20 more SP, but activates Valkyrie mode after casting, boosting all attacks for 5.0s.

subskills.name: Sakura no Haku
subskills.description: Valkyrie mode deals augmented blade attacks, with each hit dealing additional 20.0% ATK of Physical DMG.

evasion.name: Phantom Blade
evasion.description:
Quickly dash to evade enemy attacks. Can be performed twice in a row.

Time Fracture: Triggers upon an Ultimate Evasion and lasts 3s; CD: 15s.

subskills.name: Insta-Slash
subskills.description: Triggered by tapping the [ATK] button after evasion. When evasion triggers Time Fracture, Insta-Slash deals additional 150.0% ATK of Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Inner Shade
subskills.description: Increases Attack Speed by 20.0% during Time Fracture triggered by own evasion.

subskills.name: Shadow Razor
subskills.description: Shortens CD of Time Fracture by 4.0s.

subskills.name: Piercing Blade
subskills.description: Increases Crit Rate by 20.0% and Crit DMG by 30.0% against an enemy with breached elite shield.

leader.name: Spirit of Loyalty
leader.description: Leader Bonus: When Combo Hit Count exceeds 20, team gains 10% Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Spirit of Loyalty
subskills.description: Increases the team's Physical DMG by 18% when Combo Hit Count exceeds 20.

basic.name: Charge: Particle Cannon
basic.description:
Charged cannon fire that deals greater DMG with higher charge sequence.

Arm Switch: Charging mode changes with type of weapon equipped.

subskills.name: Reactive Charge
subskills.description:
When charging, Valkyrie has a barrier that blocks the next incoming attack and interrupts weak enemies. CD: 6.0s.
80.0% of incoming damage can be blocked.

subskills.name: Atomic Radiation
subskills.description: Uncharged attacks inflict 2.0 Ignite Trauma on the target and nearby enemies.

subskills.name: Chain Reaction
subskills.description: Basic ATKs and Charged ATKs gain 25.0% to Total DMG Multiplier against ignited enemies.

special.name: Switch: Gravity Shatter
special.description:
Switch entry immediately unleashes a ground breaking attack.

Ground Smasher: 150% ATK of Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Aerial Smasher
subskills.description: Gravity Shatter additionally deals 300% ATK of Physical DMG against enemies knocked airborne.

subskills.name: QTE: Super Gravity
subskills.description: QTE: Triggers when enemy is stunned, dealing 100% ATK + 4158.0 of Physical DMG. Knocks enemies airborne and casts Time Lock for 3s.

ultimate.name: Grav Singularity
ultimate.description:
Summons a powerful black hole that draws in surrounding enemies.

Black Hole: Lasts for 10s, during which the caster is invincible.
Gravitational Collapse: Affected enemies significantly lose Ignore Interrupt and deal 50% less Total DMG.
SP Cost: 50.
After unleashing the Ultimate, character switch is allowed, but Valkyrie Chariot will stay on battlefield during her Ultimate.

subskills.name: Particle Beam
subskills.description: Enemies pulled by Grav Singularity receive 1.5 Bleed Trauma every second.

subskills.name: Particle Fusion
subskills.description: Grav Singularity ends with an explosion which has a 100.0% chance to stun enemies for 5s and inflict 6 Stun Trauma.

subskills.name: Gravity Wrench
subskills.description: Gain 30% Ranged Physical DMG against enemies pulled in by Grav Singularity.

evasion.name: Dimension Shift
evasion.description:
Enters temporary Dimension Shift to evade attacks.
Time Fracture: Triggers upon an Ultimate Evasion, slowing all enemies for 5s. CD: 15s.

subskills.name: Time Lock
subskills.description: Increases charging speed by 100% during Time Fracture.

subskills.name: Quantum Lock
subskills.description: During Time Fracture and 1s afterwards, all cannon shells and missiles hitting the enemy deal 25.0% more Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Particle Rebuild
subskills.description: Shortens CD of Time Fracture by 8.0s.

subskills.name: Zero-G Barrier
subskills.description: Attacks against stunned and paralyzed enemies deal 110.0% more Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Particle Fusion
subskills.description: Uncharged and Charged Basic ATKs of cannon-type weapons deal 100.0% more Crit DMG

leader.name: Reactive Armor
leader.description: Leader Bonus: Team takes 20% less Ranged Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Reactive Armor
subskills.description: Team takes 28% less Ranged Physical DMG.

basic.name: Charge: Heavy Sword
basic.description:
Basic ATK: Tap and hold the [ATK] button to initiate a 2-sequence charge. Tap the [ATK] button again after the 1st Sequence for a follow-up attack.

Basic ATK: 180% + 250% ATK of Physical DMG.
1st Charged Sequence: 400% + 630% ATK of Physical DMG.
2nd Charged Sequence: 700% + 900% ATK of Physical DMG.
Release the [ATK] button after 2nd charge sequence to unleash the hits automatically after 2s.

subskills.name: Frontal Assault
subskills.description: During Charged ATKs, gain Ignore Interrupt. Blocks 75% of incoming Physical DMG and provides immunity against stun, freeze, and paralyze effects from frontal attacks. Weakens the blocked attacker and decreases its ATK by 60% for 8s.

subskills.name: Fiery Hew
subskills.description: Crit hit of Basic, Charged, and Sprint ATK additionally deals 850 Fire DMG.

subskills.name: Fearless
subskills.description: Reduces Physical DMG taken by 50.0% when charging.

special.name: Storm Assault
special.description:
Attacks while dashing using sweeping strikes.

Sprint ATK: Tap the [ATK] button while sprinting to attack enemies with sweeping strikes, dealing 450% ATK of Physical DMG to enemies in a large AOE.

subskills.name: Switch: Splitting Cleave
subskills.description: Switch entry unleashes a downward cleave, knocking down enemies within range and dealing 450% ATK of Physical DMG.

subskills.name: QTE: Storm Slasher
subskills.description: Triggers when an enemy is paralyzed. Attacks the target with Storm Slasher, dealing 5 x 100% + 200% ATK of Physical DMG against enemies nearby and knocking them back.

ultimate.name: Tornado Storm
ultimate.description:
Spins weapon to attack surrounding enemies.

Deals 7 x 120% ATK of Physical DMG to surrounding enemies. Last hit deals 400% ATK of Physical DMG and knocks enemies airborne.
Attracts nearby enemies when activated.
SP Cost: 50.

subskills.name: Fire Storm
subskills.description: During the Ultimate spinning attack, each hit additionally deals 240 Fire DMG.

subskills.name: Final Blow
subskills.description: Last hit of the Ultimate additionally deals 250% ATK of Physical DMG and inflicts 5 Stun Trauma.

evasion.name: Time Sprint
evasion.description:
Evasive roll. Can be triggered 2 times in a row.

After Ultimate Evasion, gain 40% Move Speed for 3s.
Time Fracture: Triggers Time Fracture upon Ultimate Evasion, slowing all enemies for 3s.
CD: 15s.

subskills.name: Swift Charge
subskills.description: Increases charging speed by 100% during the Time Fracture triggered by own evasion.

subskills.name: Vigilant
subskills.description: Shortens CD of Time Fracture by 3.0s.

subskills.name: Courage
subskills.description: Takes 35.0% less Elemental DMG.

subskills.name: Crush
subskills.description: Basic and Charged ATKs have a 15.0% chance to stun the target for 3s.

subskills.name: Feuerhau
subskills.description: Ignites enemy upon breaking its shield, dealing 150 Fire DMG every 0.5s for 5.0s.

leader.name: Stand By
leader.description: Leader Bonus: Team takes 16% less Melee Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Stand By
subskills.description: Team takes 24% less Melee Physical DMG.

basic.name: Spear of Brionac
basic.description:
Basic ATK: Mid-range 4-sequence attack using ethereal light lances.

1st Sequence: 3 x 30% ATK of Physical DMG.
2nd Sequence: 3 x 30% of Physical DMG.
3rd Sequence: 4 x 45% of Physical DMG.
4th Sequence: 3 x 75% ATK of Physical DMG against enemies within a large AOE.

subskills.name: Thunder Spear
subskills.description: Basic ATKs (including Charged ATKs) have a 8.0% chance to strike enemies with Cross Light Spears, dealing 2400 Lightning DMG. CD: 3s.

subskills.name: Spear of Imprisonment
subskills.description: Cross Light Spear immobilizes the enemy for 3.00s.

subskills.name: Blessing of Taranis
subskills.description: At 30 combo hits or higher, Basic ATK deals 30.0% ATK of bonus Lightning DMG and inflicts minor Paralyze Trauma.

special.name: Charge: Piercing Spear
special.description:
Charge during the 4-sequence Basic ATK to launch a piercing attack.

Piercing Spear: Charge by holding the [ATK] button during the 4-sequence Basic ATK.
Reaches full charge in a short time, then release the [ATK] button to deal 3 x 135% ATK of Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Charged Thrust
subskills.description: Each hit of Piercing Spear has a 13.4% chance to deal 225% ATK of Lightning DMG and inflict 5 Paralyze Trauma.

subskills.name: Switch: Holy Lance
subskills.description: Immediately unleash Piercing Spear, dealing 3 x 211% ATK of Physical DMG.

subskills.name: QTE: Triple Spears
subskills.description: Triggers when an enemy is frozen. Unleashes 3 Piercing Spears in succession, each Spear dealing 3 x 190% ATK of Physical DMG.

ultimate.name: Spearsss
ultimate.description:
Throws a spear into the air that transforms into a rain of holy javelins.

Spearsss: Deals total Physical DMG equal to 25 x 75% of ATK.
SP Cost: 75.

subskills.name: Debilitating Thunder
subskills.description: Each strike of the Ultimate has a 18.01 chance to impair the target, lowering its Ignore Interrupt and reducing its DEF by 80.0% for 3.5s.

subskills.name: Thunderous Judgment
subskills.description: Each hit from the Ultimate additionally deals 40.0% ATK of Lightning DMG.

evasion.name: Time Refuge
evasion.description:
Quick sideways dodge to evade enemy attack. Can be triggered 2 times in a row.

After Ultimate Evasion, gain 40% Move Speed for 3s.
Time Fracture: Triggers Time Fracture upon an Ultimate Evasion, slowing all enemies for 3s. CD: 15s.

subskills.name: Refuge Enhance
subskills.description: Increases the duration of Time Fracture by 2.50s.

subskills.name: Time Bender
subskills.description: Shortens CD of Ultimate Evasion by 4.00s.

subskills.name: Grace
subskills.description: After Time Fractured is triggered upon Ultimate Evasion, next deployed cross gains 45.0% Total DMG Multiplier.

subskills.name: World's #1 Cutie
subskills.description: Gain 30.0 initial SP in battle. This bonus triggersr once every 10 minutes in Open World.

subskills.name: I'm Mad
subskills.description: After deploying the cross, character gains 50.0% Attack Speed.

subskills.name: Lightning Strike
subskills.description: When Combo Hit Count exceeds 50, each hit of the next charged attack deals Combo Hit Count (max: 126) x 56 Lightning DMG and knocks down the enemy; Combo Hit Counts reset to zero after the effect.

leader.name: Our Pledge
leader.description: Leader Bonus: Shortens duration of most debuffs by 25% for the team. PSY-type characters gain 15% Elemental DMG.

subskills.name: Our Pledge
subskills.description: Leader Bonus: Shortens duration of most debuffs by 40% for the team. PSY-type characters gain 24% Elemental DMG.
